text: 9.3: Ru 10.4-11Ana kha suambarar mbe mbuav mbe ndim mbai, “Nde ŋgɨv bigi thari ndigip wari ŋgɨ thari. Nde ŋgɨv sɨga suigɨ thari, nde vhɨra mpaa thar thige rugɨ thari, nde mba thaneŋ ndi thari. Nde vhɨra kɨmararaŋ thueŋ suigɨ thari. Nde vhɨra fhava shaara mpugeni ndi thari, nde bagera sharav ŋgɨri.
